DatasetName.title: Dataset Name
DatasetName.description: A short self-explanatory title of the dataset

DataStewardEmail.title: Data Steward Email
DataStewardEmail.description: Email address publicly associated with the dataset

DataCollectionOrganization.title: Data Collection Organization
DataCollectionOrganization.description: Name of the organization or other parties responsible for collecting the data

DataUploadOrganization.title: Data Upload Organization
DataUploadOrganization.description: The name of the organization (or researcher) that is uploading the data to DataStream

ProgressCode.title: Monitoring Program Progress
ProgressCode.description: ISO 19115 Progress code indicating the status of the dataset

MaintenanceFrequencyCode.title: Maintenance Frequency
MaintenanceFrequencyCode.description: ISO 19115 Maintenance Frequency code indicating the frequency with which modifications and deletions are made to the data after it is first produced

DataCollectionInformation.title: Data Collection Information
DataCollectionInformation.description: Information about how the data were collected such as sampling methods, equipment, calibration, QA/QC protocols

DataProcessing.title: Data Processing
DataProcessing.description: Description of data cleaning, processing and/or QA/QC that was done to the data

DataSourceURL.title: Data Source URL
DataSourceURL.description: When data is being cross-posted from another Open Data Platform

OtherDataSources.title: Other Data Sources
OtherDataSources.description: Cite any third party sources of data included in the dataset

Citation.title: Citation
Citation.description: How the data should be cited if it is used by others. Supports allowed variables. Default `Chicago`: {CollectionOrganization}. {PublishYear}. "{DatasetName}" (dataset). {Version}. DataStream. {DOI}.

Licence.title: Licence & Attribution
Licence.description: Choose from Attribution Licence (ODC-By), Public-Domain Dedication and Licence (ODC-PDDL) or Open Government Licence (OGL)

Disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
Disclaimer.description: Any additional disclaimer text regarding the data that is not covered in data licence

TopicCategoryCode.title: Topic Category
TopicCategoryCode.description: ISO 19115 MD_TopicCategoryCode: high-level geographic data thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available geographic data sets. Can be used to group keywords as well. Listed examples are not exhaustive.

Changelog.title: Changelog
Changelog.description: Details on what changes were made

IntegrationTimestamp.description: When the integration last received new data

VerifyTimestamp.description: When the latest version was integrity checked (digest, signature, ledger)

IPFS.title: IPFS CID
IPFS.description: Points to a folder with all meta and data files.
